item.title: Cristhian Sosa & Lida Montovani
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Wow! First place both in milonga and vals! I am impressed, but not surprised. They wereÂ in a different class entirely as far as I could judge from the videos posted over at 2xtango. Felicitaciones! Here they are performing at La Viruta. A milonga and a vals, of course.

item.title: Alejandro Hermida & Maria Jose Grattarola
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=utwv5HDehOU httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04TYG1TlwS8 Alejandro Hermida (Campeon de milonga, 2007) & Maria Jose Grattarola on their first European tour. Muy lindo! Felicitaciones!
